name: Oracle Database Tool
semantic_context: Get, add and update data in Oracle database
natural_language_description: 这是 Oracle Database Tool 节点。主要用于: Get, add and update data in Oracle database

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.default: Get, add and update data in Oracle database
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Get, add and update data in Oracle database | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: database
available_options: Database (值: database)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: insert
available_options: Delete (值: deleteTable) - Delete an entire table or rows in a table
Execute SQL (值: execute) - Execute an SQL
Insert (值: insert) - Insert rows in a table
Insert or Update (值: upsert) - Insert or update rows in a table
Select (值: select) - Select rows from a table
Update (值: update) - Update rows in a table

schema.name: schema
schema.description: The schema that contains the table you want to work on
schema.natural_language_description: 参数名: Schema | 作用: The schema that contains the table you want to work on | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

table.name: table
table.description: The table you want to work on
table.natural_language_description: 参数名: Table | 作用: The table you want to work on | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

deleteCommand.name: deleteCommand
deleteCommand.natural_language_description: 参数名: Command | 默认值: truncate
available_options: Truncate (值: truncate) - Only removes the table's data and preserves the table's structure
Delete (值: delete) - Delete the rows that match the 'Select Rows' conditions below. If no selection is made, all rows in the table are deleted.
Drop (值: drop) - Deletes the table's data and also the table's structure permanently

where.name: where
where.description: If not set, all rows will be selected
where.natural_language_description: 参数名: Select Rows | 作用: If not set, all rows will be selected | 默认值: {}
available_options: values (值: None)

combineConditions.name: combineConditions
combineConditions.description: How to combine the conditions defined in "Select Rows": AND requires all conditions to be true, OR requires at least one condition to be true
combineConditions.natural_language_description: 参数名: Combine Conditions | 作用: How to combine the conditions defined in "Select Rows": AND requires all conditions to be true, OR requires at least one condition to be true | 默认值: AND
available_options: AND (值: AND) - Only rows that meet all the conditions are selected
OR (值: OR) - Rows that meet at least one condition are selected

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: autoCommit (值: None) - Whether this property is true, then the transaction in the current connection is automatically committed at the end of statement execution
params (值: None) - Enter the values for the bind parameters used in the statement

fetchArraySize (值: None) - This property is a number that sets the size of an internal buffer used for fetching query rows from Oracle Database. Changing it may affect query performance but does not affect how many rows are returned to the application.

prefetchRows (值: None) - This property is a query tuning option to set the number of additional rows the underlying Oracle driver fetches during the internal initial statement execution phase of a query
outputColumns (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression
largeNumbersOutputAsString (值: None) - Whether the numbers should be retrieved as string
stmtBatching (值: None) - The way queries should be sent to the database
stmtBatching (值: None) - The way queries should be sent to the database

stmtBatchingNotice.displayName: Important: Single Statement mode works only for the first item
stmtBatchingNotice.name: stmtBatchingNotice
stmtBatchingNotice.natural_language_description: 参数名: Important: Single Statement mode works only for the first item

query.name: query
query.description: The SQL statement to execute. You can use n8n expressions and positional parameters like :1, :2, :3, or named parameters like :name, :ID, etc to refer to the 'Bind Variable Placeholder Values' set in options below.
query.natural_language_description: 参数名: Statement | 作用: The SQL statement to execute. You can use n8n expressions and positional parameters like :1, :2, :3, or named parameters like :name, :ID, etc to refer to the 'Bind Variable Placeholder Values' set in options below. | 提示: Consider using bind parameters to prevent SQL injection attacks. Add them in the options below | (必填项)

columns.name: columns
columns.natural_language_description: 参数名: Columns | 默认值: {'mappingMode': 'defineBelow', 'value': None} | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50

sort.name: sort
sort.natural_language_description: 参数名: Sort | 默认值: {}
available_options: values (值: None)
